reviews.review:
You've heard of it. If you haven't played it by now, and are looking for another reason, here it is: IT'S ABSOLUTELY A DELIGHT!! And your life will be forever enriched by having played it. Gameplay, puzzles, story, dialogue- it just does it all so well. 

Play the game, hombre.
Really good main campaign and lots of high quality community made puzzles

If you haven't played this game, do it.
legal, teu cu no meu pau
It is possibly the best 2-player Co-op game of all time!

I have always loved this game and I always will. At the time this kind of gameplay and the portals were so innovative, now it has inspired so many other small developers to make these kinds of puzzle games and it has brought so many cool games to the market. Portal and Portal 2 started a whole new genre of games and I love it. I am so proud to reach 150 hours on this game and both portal games will always have a place in my heart <3. I love to see that people are still playing this and making content. If you haven't played this, seriously go give it a try, although I don't think there are alot of new people reading these anyways.
Portal 2 ist ein sehr gutes Puzzle-Story Spiel was ich jedem nur empfehlen kann.
Great game for thinking with friends!

Un juego que te recordar√° a tiempo m√°s buenos cuando empezabas a jugar el PC. Bastante liviano para jugadores inexpertos o no regulares, una historia divertida con un humor muy peculiar y que, a pesar de ser una secuela puedes entender sin haber jugado el primero. Mecanica unicas, puzzles tan complicados como interesantes, un juego tranquilo para las tardes pero emocionante.

Das Spiel hat sehr coole Mechaniken, dazu kommt noch die coole Story !
